title: Search for the Battleship Bismarck
creator_credit: Peter Schnall, Christine Weber and National Geographic Society
brief_description: National Geographic looks back at the first - and last- mission of the Bismarck, sunk on May 27, 1941 with a loss of more than 2,000 lives. Narrated by Richard Kiley, they talk with survivors of the notorious World War II battle, and reveals exclusive footage of the remarkable exploration for the sunken ship 600 miles off the coast of France.
